snippet: DRAPKIN--Donald. The board and staff of Anderson Ranch Arts Center mourn the death of Donald Drapkin, a highly involved member of our National Council. Donald's enthusiasm, humor and generosity have had a tremendous impact on Anderson Ranch and the entire Aspen/Snowmass community. We extend our deepest sympathies to his partner and our Board Member Sue Hostetler and her daughter, Donald's children, and the Drapkin family. Ann Korologos, Chair, Board of Trustees; Nancy Wilhelms, Executive Director 1/3
